00043 //----------------------------------------------------------
00044 GrRenderAmbience::GrRenderAmbience( GrStreamingIB* streamingIB, unsigned int maxIndexBatchSize )
00045 : _streamingIB( streamingIB )
00046 , _maxIndexBatchSize( maxIndexBatchSize )
00047 , _wireframe( false )
00048 , _colorTextureEnable( true )
00049 , _batchEnable( true )
00050 {
00052         _normalizeCube = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEXCUBE_NORMALIZE );
00053 
00055         _defaultBump = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_GRAY );
00056 
00058         _stipple[ 0 ] = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE0 );
00059         _stipple[ 1 ] = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE1 );
00060         _stipple[ 2 ] = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE2 );
00061         _stipple[ 3 ] = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_STIPPLE3 );
00062 
00064         _white = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_WHITE );
00065 
00067         _black = gGrTextureMgr->FindTexture( GR_SYSTEX_BLACK );
00068 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 void
00083 GrRenderAmbience::RenderAmbience( GrRenderList& postRenderObjects, const GrRenderList& objects, const GrCamera& camera,
00084                                                                   const GrColor& ambientColor, unsigned int time, EGRQUALITY quality )
00085 {
00087         if ( !objects.GetItemCount() )
00088                 return;
00089 
00091         unsigned int uberPatchSetCount = objects.GetUberPatchSetCount();
00092         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < uberPatchSetCount; ++i )
00093                 objects.GetUberPatchSet( i )->CacheTiles( &camera, 512, 512 );
00094         gGrUberDetailCache->PrepareDetailCache();
00095 
00097         GrSetState( GR_DEPTHTEST | ( _wireframe ? GR_WIREFRAME : 0 ) );
00098         GrSetWriteEnable( GR_DEPTH | GR_RGBA );
00099         GrSetDepthMode( EDM_LESSEQUAL );
00100 
00102         _normalizeCube->Bind( GR_TEX_CUBE_NORMALIZE, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE );
00103 
00105         const MMat4x4& viewProjMatrix = camera.GetViewProjMatrix();
00106 
00108         const MVec3& worldCameraPos = camera.GetPos();
00109 
00111         objects.Sort( SortCmp );
00112 
00114         if ( !_colorTextureEnable )
00115         {
00116                 _defaultBump->Bind( GR_TEX_BUMP );
00117                 _white->Bind( GR_TEX_DIFFUSE );
00118                 _black->Bind( GR_TEX_EMISSIVE );
00119         }
00120 
00122         GrShader* prevShader = 0;
00123         unsigned int stippleMask = 0;
00124         const unsigned int kStateMask = ~GR_WIREFRAME;
00125         unsigned int startObj = 0;
00126         unsigned int objCount = objects.GetItemCount();
00127         while ( startObj < objCount )
00128         {
00130                 unsigned int endObj = 0;
00131                 const GrMaterial* material = GetMaterialSpan( endObj, objects, startObj );
00132 
00134                 if ( material->GetPostProcessPassCount() > 0 )
00135                 {
00136                         for ( unsigned int obj = startObj; obj < endObj; ++obj )
00137                                 postRenderObjects.Add( objects[ obj ] );
00138                 }
00139 
00141                 if ( material->GetStipple() )
00142                 {
00144                         _stipple[ stippleMask ]->Bind( GR_TEX_STIPPLE, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_REPEAT, GL_REPEAT );
00145 
00147                         ++stippleMask;
00148                         stippleMask %= 4;
00149                 }
00150                 else
00151                 {
00152                         _white->Bind( GR_TEX_STIPPLE, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_REPEAT, GL_REPEAT );
00153                 }
00154 
00156                 const unsigned int passCount = material->GetPassCount();
00157                 for ( unsigned int pass = 0; pass < passCount; ++pass )
00158                 {
00160                         const GrMaterialPass* curPass = material->GetPass( pass );
00161 
00163                         GrShader* curShader = curPass->GetAmbientShader();
00164                         B_ASSERT( curShader );
00165 
00167                         if ( curShader != prevShader )
00168                         {
00169                                 curShader->Bind( quality );
00170                                 curShader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_AMBIENT_COLOR, ambientColor );
00171                                 prevShader = curShader;
00172                         }
00173 
00175                         curPass->ApplyStates( kStateMask, GR_DEPTH | GR_RGBA );
00176                         curPass->ApplyAmbientBlendStates( kStateMask );
00177 
00178                         curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyGlobalState( curShader );
00179                         if ( _colorTextureEnable )
00180                         {
00181                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_BUMP,              GR_TEX_BUMP,            curShader,      GrShader::EP_BUMP_MOD,          GrShader::EP_BUMP_ADD           );
00182                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_DIFFUSE,   GR_TEX_DIFFUSE,         curShader,      GrShader::EP_DIFFUSE_MOD,               GrShader::EP_DIFFUSE_ADD        );
00183                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_EMISSIVE,  GR_TEX_EMISSIVE,        curShader,      GrShader::EP_EMISSIVE_MOD,      GrShader::EP_EMISSIVE_ADD       );
00184                                 curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_AMBIENT,   GR_TEX_AMBIENT,         curShader,      GrShader::EP_AMBIENT_MOD,               GrShader::EP_AMBIENT_ADD        );
00185                         }
00186                         curPass->GetTextureSet().ApplyStageState( ES_AMBIENT,   GR_TEX_AMBIENT,         curShader,      GrShader::EP_AMBIENT_MOD,               GrShader::EP_AMBIENT_ADD        );
00187                         curPass->ApplyVertexParams( curShader );
00188 
00190                         for ( unsigned int obj = startObj; obj < endObj; ++obj )
00191                         {
00193                                 const GrRenderList::SItem& renderable = objects[ obj ];
00194 
00196                                 if ( renderable.preTransformed && _batchEnable )
00197                                 {
00198                                         curShader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_MODEL_VIEW_PROJECTION_MATRIX, viewProjMatrix );
00199                                         curShader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_VIEW_POSITION, worldCameraPos );
00200                                         if ( renderable.meshInst->GetMesh()->GetRange( renderable.range ).count < _maxIndexBatchSize )
00201                                                 obj = BatchRender( objects, obj, endObj, AMBIENT_VERTEX_COMPONENTS, time );
00202                                         else
00203                                                 renderable.meshInst->RenderRange( renderable.range, AMBIENT_VERTEX_COMPONENTS, time );
00204                                 }
00205                                 else
00206                                 {
00209                                         const MMat4x4& world = renderable.meshInst->GetTransform();
00210                                         const MMat4x4& invWorld = renderable.meshInst->GetInvTransform();
00211                                         MVec3 localEyePos = invWorld.TransformCoord( worldCameraPos );
00212 
00214                                         curShader->SetEngineParam4x4fv( GrShader::EP_MODEL_VIEW_PROJECTION_MATRIX, viewProjMatrix * world );
00215                                         curShader->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_LOCAL_VIEW_POSITION, localEyePos );
00216 
00218                                         renderable.meshInst->RenderRange( renderable.range, AMBIENT_VERTEX_COMPONENTS, time );
00219                                 }
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222                 startObj = endObj;
00223         }
00224 
00225         CHECK_GL();
00226 }

00233 //----------------------------------------------------------
00234 unsigned int
00235 GrRenderAmbience::BatchRender( const GrRenderList& renderableArray, unsigned int startIdx, unsigned int endIdx,
00236                                                            unsigned int vertexComponents, unsigned int time )
00237 {
00240         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].preTransformed );
00241         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetSkinInst() == 0 );
00242         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh()->GetIndexData() != 0 );
00243 
00245         B_ASSERT( renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh()->GetRange( renderableArray[ startIdx ].range ).count < _maxIndexBatchSize )
00246 
00248         URef< GrMesh > mesh = renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh();
00249         unsigned int minIndex = 0xFFFF;
00250         unsigned int maxIndex = 0;
00251         unsigned int count = 0;
00252 
00254         _streamingIB->Bind();
00255         unsigned int offset = _streamingIB->GetOffset();
00256 
00259         do
00260         {
00262                 const GrRenderList::SItem& curRenderable = renderableArray[ startIdx ];
00263 
00265                 if ( ( count + mesh->GetRange( curRenderable.range ).count ) > _maxIndexBatchSize )
00266                         break;
00267 
00269                 count += curRenderable.meshInst->BatchRange( *_streamingIB, curRenderable.range, time );
00270 
00272                 minIndex = Min( mesh->GetRange( curRenderable.range ).minIndex, minIndex );
00273                 maxIndex = Max( mesh->GetRange( curRenderable.range ).maxIndex, maxIndex );
00274 
00276                 ++startIdx;
00277         }
00278         while (
00279                 startIdx < endIdx &&
00280                 renderableArray[ startIdx ].preTransformed &&
00281                 renderableArray[ startIdx ].meshInst->GetMesh() == mesh
00282                 );
00283 
00285         CHECK_GL();
00286 
00288         mesh->GetVertexData()->Bind( vertexComponents );
00289         CHECK_GL();
00290 
00292         bglDrawRangeElements( 
00293                 GL_TRIANGLES,
00294                 minIndex,
00295                 maxIndex,
00296                 count,
00297                 GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT,
00298                 ( ( unsigned short* )0 ) + offset );
00299         CHECK_GL();
00300 
00302         return startIdx-1;
00303 }
00304 
00305 //----------------------------------------------------------
00306 const GrMaterial*
00307 GrRenderAmbience::GetMaterialSpan( unsigned int& spanEnd, const GrRenderList& list, unsigned int startObj )
00308 {
00309         B_ASSERT( startObj < list.GetItemCount() );
00310         const GrMaterial* curMaterial = list[ startObj ].meshInst->GetMaterial( list[ startObj ].range );
00311         spanEnd = startObj+1;
00312         while ( spanEnd < list.GetItemCount() && curMaterial == list[ spanEnd ].meshInst->GetMaterial( list[ spanEnd ].range ) )
00313                 ++spanEnd;
00314         return curMaterial;
00315 }
00316 
00317 //----------------------------------------------------------
00318 bool
00319 GrRenderAmbience::SortCmp( const GrRenderList::SItem& left, const GrRenderList::SItem& right )
00320 {
00322         const GrMaterial* leftMat = left.meshInst->GetMaterial( left.range );
00323         const GrMaterial* rightMat = right.meshInst->GetMaterial( right.range );
00324         B_ASSERT( leftMat != 0 && rightMat != 0 );
00325 
00327         if ( leftMat->GetSortType() != rightMat->GetSortType() )
00328                 return leftMat->GetSortType() < rightMat->GetSortType();
00329 
00331         return ( size_t )leftMat < ( size_t )rightMat;  
00332 }
